extendedInfo.description: Your source for the best Nebraska Cornhuskers news, photos and video now has a new home -- your Android device!Omaha World-Herald's very own Huskers app gives you 24/7 access to all of the Husker coverage you expect from its award-winning sports staff.Live Updates  â We've added live game updates as the action happens! Check on the current game stats or follow the play by play reports. When it's done you can go back and relive the game!Breaking news and blog posts â Daily practice reports, game stories, player interviews and features are delivered right to the app every day of the week. On the Big Red Today blog, you'll get even more insider Huskers news and notes from our beat writers.Photos and video â Watch Bo Pelini's weekly and postgame press conferences, player and coach interviews and game recap videos, plus all of the Huskers fan photos and action shots in photo galleries that will make you feel like you were actually in Memorial Stadium for the game.Team info â What's the Top 10 look like this week? Who's wearing No. 74? With updated polls, conference standings, team rosters and schedules, you'll have all the answers at your fingertips.The Big Red Today app is the best place for Husker news and information.And it's only from the Omaha World-Herald.Go Big Red!

reviews.title: Excellent Update!
reviews.comment: Liked it before. Really like it now!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Husker news app
reviews.comment: Great app, aside from the crashes that it has from time to time. That, and links provided in articles/blog posts, don\'t open up. Otherwise, a great app to keep you up to date.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app. Would be nice if it didn\'t crash if the device has no gps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GBR
reviews.comment: Thanks Weird Herald! Lots to like so far. Good app for Husker fanatics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Recently moved to Florida so I love being able to easily get my Omaha news still. My favorite feature is that it allows me to continue blogging about my Huskers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So-so
reviews.comment: There is no info in the \"team info\" section. What\'s the deal?
reviews.author: A Google User
